mapper.select: SELECT workID, parentID, workTitle, workContent, workState, startDate, finishDate, workerID FROM work;
SELECT issueID, workID, issueTitle, issueContent, issueState, workerID FROM issue;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work (workerID ,parentID, workTitle, workContent, workState, startDate, finishDate) values (#{workerID}, #{parentID}, #{workTitle}, #{workContent}, #{workState}, #{startDate}, #{finishDate});
INSERT INTO issue (workID,issueState,issueTitle, issueContent, workerID) values (#{workID}, #{issueState}, #{issueTitle}, #{issueContent}, #{workerID});
mapper.select: SELECT workID, parentID, workTitle, workContent, workState, startDate, finishDate, workerID FROM work WHERE workID = #{workID};
SELECT issueID, workID, issueContent, issueTitle, issueState, workerID FROM issue WHERE issueID = #{issueID};
mapper.update: UPDATE work SET workContent = #{workContent}, workTitle = #{workTitle}, startDate = #{startDate}, finishDate = #{finishDate}, workState = #{workState}, workerID = #{workerID} WHERE workID = #{workID};
UPDATE issue SET issueContent = #{issueContent}, issueTitle = #{issueTitle}, issueState = #{issueState}, workID = #{workID}, workerID = #{workerID} WHERE issueID = #{issueID};
